chat_history.message:
Hello, my Galaxy S21 Ultra 5G is experiencing the following issue:

Hello, my phone has still not been shipped. It was supposed to arrive on May 30th. Thank you

Thank you for your help,

Dear ecomobile

I hope you’re all right. 
 
The customer contacts us to inform us that he has not yet received his order. 
 
After checking with us, I see that the package has still not been shipped. 
 
As a reminder, you have 3 days for phones and iPad, 5 days for computers or other household devices. 
 
Please provide us with a valid tracking link and estimated delivery date for the customer. 

Regards,
Melinda from the Back Care Team

Dear Backcare,

We extend our sincerest apologies for the inconvenience caused. It has come to our attention that the parcel may have been stolen. We take such incidents very seriously and have launched an extensive internal inquiry to ascertain the circumstances surrounding this unfortunate event. As a gesture of our commitment to customer satisfaction and to alleviate any inconvenience caused, we have promptly refunded the customer in full for their order.

Regards,
RK
